cast.name: 马蒂·帕帕奇安 Marty Papazian
特里斯坦·雷克·勒布 Tristan Lake Leabu
劳拉·圣吉亚科莫 Laura San Giacomo
麦克斯·查尔斯 Max Charles

writer.name: 马蒂·帕帕奇安 Marty Papazian

director.name: 马蒂·帕帕奇安 Marty Papazian

introduction: From Award Winning Director Martin Papazian comes this deeply personal and poignant tale about two lost souls who find hope and the ability to once again believe in forgiveness and love amidst a dangerous world both real and imagined.With blood on his hands and haunted by his past, hard-drinking, burn-out soldier Anthony Hayworth has given up on life - until he meets his scruffy next door neighbor, 10-year-old Wade. When Wades Mom dies from an over-dose, Anthony illegally adopts the boy and takes him on a journey to find his father, who doesnt exist. Wade becomes Anthonys link back to humanity and he will go to any length to shield him from the hostile outside world that seeks to separate them.
